title: David Lammy – 2021 Comments on the Public Accounts Committee Report
author: admin
summary: The comments made by David Lammy, the Shadow Secretary of State for Justice, on 24 March 2021.
content:
A decade of Conservative cuts to our justice system has left victims waiting years to get justice if they get it at all, while serious criminals are being let off the hook.
